chapter.title: Bootstrapping the Kernel
chapter.para: The bootstrap provides a simple mechanism for bootstrapping the microcontainer.

sect1.title: Bootstrap - bootstrapping
sect1.para: This bootstrap creates and configures the microcontainer. This involves creating a KernelConfig from which the KernelFactory can be instantiated using the KernelInstantiator.

sect1.title: Config - bootstrap configuration
sect1.para: This KernelConfig provides the mechanism to configure the bootstrap including how the core kernel services are instantiated and configured.

sect1.title: KernelFactory - kernel instantiation
sect1.para: The KernelFactory is responsible for initializing and configuring the kernel services using information provided by the KernelConfig.
